abstract: Dandenong - Three different cultures, three different stories
description: There are 140 cultural groups living in Greater Dandenong, Victoria. To celebrate this cultural diversity this short documentary film presents Maria (Hungarian), Andreas (Greek Cypriot) and Rosanna (Chilean) as they each tell their personal story of their own background, family, culture and migrant experience to the sounds of traditional music and images of family photographs.
